title: How to configure CORS on WildFly
content: If you are running your web applications on WildFly, you can configure CORS to allow cross-domain requests. In this article, we will go through the steps to configure CORS on WildFly. What is a Cross Resource Sharing (CORS)? Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) is a security mechanism that allows web applications to make requests to a ...  The post appeared first on .
